Text: Could we have a translation to english?

1.  To extract the file.  

2.  To start the generator of serial (Windows XP Keygen. exe).  

3.  To choose under the voice "Product Family" the voice? Windows XP Benefit.  VLK?.  

4.  To click on "Bred" and to leave the open program.  

5.  To start Magical Jelly Bean Keyfinder (keyfinder. exe).  

6.  In the menu "Options" to choose? Change Windows Key?.  

7.  To introduce the code bred with the generator of serial.  

8.  To click on "Change"

9.  The directory to enter Windows\System32\drivers\etc\ and editare the file Hosts introducing the following one condenses to the end of the file:  127.0.0.1
mpa. one. microsoft. com

10.  To cancel, if you show, the file LegitControlCheck. dll, WgaTray. exe and WgaLogon. dll in the directory Windows\System32

11.  The directory to enter Documents and Settings\All users\Given Application and to cancel, if you show, the
sottodirectory? Genuine Windows Advantage? and? Genuine Office Advantage?.  12.  To visit the following page:  

http://www.microsoft.com/genuine/default.mspx?displaylang=it

13.  After to have clicked on "Confirmation Windows" to install the application WGA Validation Tool ActiveX
when asked for.  

14.  To perform the software "Microsoft Genuine Microsoft Validation Diagnostic Tool" (MGADiag. exe).  

15.  Choosing "Continuous" in the screened successive to the voice "Validation status" should appear the wording
"Genuine".
